recognition_tasks.title: Submit Monthly Team Recognition
recognition_tasks.description: Nominate team members for monthly recognition program
recognition_tasks.notes: Consider contributions to the recent product launch

recognition_tasks.title: Submit Marketing Campaign Award Nomination
recognition_tasks.description: Complete nomination for industry award for recent marketing campaign
recognition_tasks.notes: Deadline for industry award submission is March 17

recognition_tasks.title: Quarterly Sales Achievement Recognition
recognition_tasks.description: Identify and recognize top sales performers for Q1
recognition_tasks.notes: Select top performers based on both revenue and customer satisfaction metrics

recognition_tasks.title: Prepare Service Anniversary Recognitions
recognition_tasks.description: Prepare recognition materials for employees celebrating service anniversaries in April
recognition_tasks.notes: Five employees reaching milestone anniversaries in April

recognition_tasks.title: Innovation Award Nomination
recognition_tasks.description: Submit nomination for company innovation award
recognition_tasks.notes: Nominated the team for their work on the new cloud architecture

recognition_tasks.title: Recognize Team for Positive Customer Feedback
recognition_tasks.description: Share and recognize team members mentioned in recent positive customer feedback
recognition_tasks.notes: Three team members were specifically mentioned by customers this month

recognition_tasks.title: Values Champion Recognition
recognition_tasks.description: Nominate employees who exemplify company values for quarterly recognition
recognition_tasks.notes: Looking for nominees who demonstrate all core values consistently

recognition_tasks.title: Project Completion Recognition
recognition_tasks.description: Recognize team members for successful completion of the database migration project
recognition_tasks.notes: Project was completed ahead of schedule and under budget

recognition_tasks.title: Recognize Outstanding Mentors
recognition_tasks.description: Identify and recognize team members who have excelled as mentors
recognition_tasks.notes: Focus on mentors who have helped new hires ramp up quickly

recognition_tasks.title: Recognize Training Completion Achievements
recognition_tasks.description: Recognize employees who completed additional professional certifications this quarter
recognition_tasks.notes: Several employees have completed advanced certifications on their own time
